availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Farmer (Harlan County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Harlan County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Catharine Farmer. Father of Lewis Farmer, Abigail Farmer, Elizabeth Farmer, America Farmer, Leonard Farmer, and Fanny Farmer.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harlan County, p. 3. Find A Grave, "William C. Farmer (March 26, 1824-February 13, 1910)," Memorial #145582302, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/145582302 (accessed March 29, 2018).
